Properties.ProtectedString:
local Player = game:GetService("Players").LocalPlayer local Mouse = Player:GetMouse()
local Tool = script.Parent local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote")
local CAS = game:GetService("ContextActionService") local ActionName = "SteampunkBow"
function onAction(actionName, inputState, inputObject) if inputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then Remote:FireServer("Start") end
if inputState == Enum.UserInputState.End then Remote:FireServer("End", Mouse.Hit.p) end end
function onEquipped() --ensure unequip onUnequipped()
--bind CAS:BindActionToInputTypes( ActionName, onAction, false, Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1, Enum.UserInputType.Touch ) end
function onUnequipped() --unbind CAS:UnbindAction(ActionName) end
--connect Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Handle = Tool:WaitForChild("Handle") local Remote = Tool:WaitForChild("Remote")
local TickEvent
local Charging = false local Charge = 0 local ChargeRate = 25 local ChargeVis
local MinChargeTime = 1.3 local ChargeNeededToFire = ChargeRate * MinChargeTime
local Damage = 30
local R = math.random
local IceColors = { BrickColor.new("Bright blue"), BrickColor.new("Teal"), BrickColor.new("Deep blue"), }
function RP() return R() * math.pi * 2 end
function iceColor() return IceColors[math.random(1, #IceColors)] end
function getPlayer() local char = Tool.Parent local player = game:GetService("Players"):GetPlayerFromCharacter(char) return player end
function lerp(a, b, r) return a + (b - a) * r end
function createChargeVis() local part = Instance.new("Part") part.FormFactor = "Symmetric" part.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) part.CanCollide = false part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue") part.Transparency = 0.5 part.Material = "Ice" part.TopSurface = "Smooth" part.BottomSurface = "Smooth"
local mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") mesh.MeshType = "Sphere" mesh.Name = "Mesh" mesh.Parent = part
local fire = Instance.new("Fire") fire.Name = "Fire" fire.Size = 2 fire.Color = part.BrickColor.Color fire.SecondaryColor = part.BrickColor.Color fire.Parent = part
return part end
function visualizeCharge() if Charge > 0 then if not ChargeVis then ChargeVis = createChargeVis() ChargeVis.Parent = workspace
local w = Instance.new("Weld") w.Part0 = Handle w.Part1 = ChargeVis w.C0 = CFrame.new(0, 0, -Handle.Size.Z / 2) w.Parent = w.Part0 end
local size = lerp(0, 5, Charge/100) ChargeVis.Mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(size, size, size) ChargeVis.Fire.Size = size else if ChargeVis then ChargeVis.Fire.Enabled = false ChargeVis.Transparency = 1 game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(ChargeVis, 1) ChargeVis = nil end end end
function onTick(dt) if Charging then Charge = Charge + ChargeRate * dt else Charge = Charge - ChargeRate * dt end
if Charge > 100 then Charge = 100 elseif Charge < 0 then Charge = 0 end
visualizeCharge() end
function contains(t, v) for _, val in pairs(t) do if val == v then return true end end return false end
function tagHuman(human) local val = Instance.new("ObjectValue") val.Name = "creator" val.Value = getPlayer() val.Parent = human game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(val, 1) end
function grow(part, totalTime) local startSize = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0) local endSize = part.Size local c = part.CFrame
local t = 0 local event event = game:GetService("RunService").Heartbeat:connect(function(dt) t = t + dt local size = lerp(startSize, endSize, t/totalTime) part.Size = size
if t >= totalTime then event:disconnect() part.Size = endSize part.Sound:Play() end
part.CFrame = c end)
part.Size = startSize part.CFrame = c end
function crystallize(position, size) local victims = {} local humans = {}
local anchor = Instance.new("Part") anchor.Anchored = true anchor.Transparency = 1 anchor.CanCollide = false anchor.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) anchor.Position = position anchor.Parent = workspace game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(anchor, 2 + size)
local sound = Handle.IceFormSound:Clone() sound.Pitch = math.random(50, 70)/100 sound.Parent = anchor sound:Play()
for crystalNumber = 1, 6 + size do local lower = math.max(0, crystalNumber - 3) local upper = crystalNumber + 1 local growTime = crystalNumber / 3
local crystal = Instance.new("Part") crystal.Transparency = 0.5 crystal.FormFactor = "Custom" crystal.Anchored = true crystal.CanCollide = false crystal.TopSurface = "Smooth" crystal.BottomSurface = "Smooth" crystal.Material = "Ice" crystal.BrickColor = iceColor() crystal.CFrame = CFrame.new(position) * CFrame.Angles(RP(), RP(), RP()) crystal.Size = Vector3.new(R(lower, upper), R(lower, upper), R(lower, upper))
local sound = Handle.IceFormSound:Clone() sound.Name = "Sound" sound.Pitch = math.random(60,140)/100 sound.Parent = crystal
grow(crystal, growTime) crystal.Parent = workspace game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(crystal, 2 + size)
crystal.Touched:connect(function(part) if contains(victims, part) then return end if part.Anchored then return end
table.insert(victims, part)
local w = Instance.new("Weld") w.Part0 = anchor w.Part1 = part w.C0 = anchor.CFrame:toObjectSpace(part.CFrame) w.Parent = w.Part0
if part.Parent and part.Parent:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") then local human = part.Parent.Humanoid if not contains(humans, human) then table.insert(humans, human) tagHuman(human) human:TakeDamage(Damage) end end end) end end
function onBulletTouched(part, bullet) if part:IsDescendantOf(Tool.Parent) then return end if part == ChargeVis then return end if part.Transparency == 1 and part.CanCollide == false then return end
local position = bullet.Position bullet:Destroy() crystallize(position, bullet.Size.X) end
function fire(targetPos) if Charge < ChargeNeededToFire then return end
local a = Handle.CFrame:pointToWorldSpace(Vector3.new(0, 0, -Handle.Size.Z/2)) local b = targetPos local c = CFrame.new(a, b)
local size = math.floor(lerp(1, 4, Charge/100))
local lift = Instance.new("BodyForce") lift.force = Vector3.new(0, 150, 0)
local bullet = createChargeVis() lift.Parent = bullet bullet.Size = Vector3.new(size, size, size) bullet.CFrame = c bullet.Velocity = bullet.CFrame.lookVector * 128 bullet.Parent = workspace game:GetService("Debris"):AddItem(bullet)
bullet.Touched:connect(function(part) onBulletTouched(part, bullet) end)
Charge = 0
Handle.Fire.Pitch = math.random(90, 110)/100 Handle.Fire:Play() end
function onEquipped() --ensure unequip onUnequipped()
--tick TickEvent = game:GetService("RunService").Heartbeat:connect(onTick) end
function onUnequipped() --stop tick if TickEvent then TickEvent:disconnect() end
--stop the charge! Charging = false Charge = 0 if ChargeVis then ChargeVis:Destroy() ChargeVis = nil end end
function onRemote(player, func, ...) if player == getPlayer() then local args = {...}
if func == "Start" then Charging = true elseif func == "End" then Charging = false fire(args[1]) end end end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped) Remote.OnServerEvent:connect(onRemote)
